thread.title_full: Khloe reveals talks about Tristan Thompson relationship | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Khloe reveals talks about Tristan Thompson relationship | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Khloe Kardashian has opened up about the life she shares with boyfriend Tristan Thompson in Cleveland. Making an appearance on Tuesday's episode of The Talk , the 32-year-old reality star discussed her relationship with the Cleveland Cavaliers player and how she's settling into life in the midwest. 'I'm in a really good space right now in my life,' Khloe told the hosts. Scroll down for video 'I'm in a really good space right now': Khloe Kardashian discussed her relationship with Tristan Thompson on The Talk on Tuesday 'I feel really happy and secure and I'm just in a really positive, healthy relationship.' she said of dating the Cleveland based NBA player 'It's really good. I'm in a really good place,' she said about her romance with the 25-year-old NBA player. 'I feel really happy and secure and I'm just in a really positive, healthy relationship.' The E! star, who is based in Los Angeles, has been spending more and more time in Ohio with her beau and says she's really enjoying the change of scenery. 'I actually love Cleveland. Everyone is so nice there. I love the four seasons. I love that it snows. I spent Christmas there and it was — snow. I'm not used to that. Midwest living: The 32-year-old reality star gushed about her life in Cleveland and said she loves cooking and having a normal routine 'And everyone is so nice and it's a normal - I love routine. It's a normal routine life.' Khloe said of being in Ohio where her 25-year-old beau plays for the Cleveland Cavaliers 'I'm born and raised in California, so everyone thinks I'm crazy for loving the snow. I'm like, "It's snowing! This is so fun!" And he's like, "No, you're going to get over it in one year." But I love it,' Khloe said. The KUWTK star said she's enjoying the lifestyle in Cleveland where she gets to have a normal routine and cook for her man. 'And everyone is so nice and it's a normal - I love routine. It's a normal routine life. I love to cook, so I get to cook dinner every day. It's this home, family thing that I've been craving that I get to have in Cleveland.' Camera ready: The E! star wore a silky blouse and her blonde locks styled sleekly for the appearance Dream in denim: Khloe showed off her figure in a denim skirt and lace bralet in this snap on Wednesday Accentuate your Kardashian-esque curves with Khloe's denim pencil skirt £108.27
